title: How do we hypnotize someone to sleep? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hypnosis applied to help someone to sleep is basically guidance to deep relaxation. There are many possible techniques and narratives a hypnotherapist might use: just think of a parent’s storytelling lulling a child to sleep. The sound of the hypnotherapist’s voice and the cadence of speech are especially important.
